original_title: Los blues de la calle Pop (Aventuras de Felipe Malboro, volumen 8)
overview: Mary Ocky, a beautiful girl from Mondonedo, Ohio, comes to seek the help of the famous PI Philip Marlboro in order to find her boyfriend Macho Jim who went missing three months earlier under obscure circumstances. Marlboro’s investigations take him to Shit City, a grim place devoured by sin and corruption where punk gangs have taken over.
title: The Blues of Pop Street
